name: I have a shrink ray.
description: This game was created over the course of a weekend, and was made following the theme "Mini". Use WASD to move, space to jump, and when you hover over an object, you can scroll up to increase it's size, and scroll down to shrink it. Also, importantly, use R to restart the level, I have added no measure to stop you from falling infinitely. Be cautious. Use your amazing shrink ray to beat each level! Thank you for playing!
